summary: Implements a Clifford synthesis plugin that uses the greedy Bravyi‑Hu‑Maslov‑Shaydulin algorithm to decompose Clifford operators into elementary gate sequences, and integrates with the HighLevelSynthesis framework via a configurable plugin identifier.
business_intent: Enable users to quickly generate and optimize Clifford circuits with a heuristic, high‑performance synthesis method, simplifying integration into quantum compilation pipelines.
